auth.flowRestarted.message.defaultMessage: The form had to be reloaded{reason, select, security_csrf_violation { because the security token expired.} security_identity_mismatch { because your session changed} self_service_flow_expired { because the form expired} self_service_flow_return_to_forbidden { because the return URL is invalid} other {}}. Please try again.
auth.flowRestarted.message.description: The message telling the user that the form they submitted had to be reloaded
